nodeList.loreText: The souls of the dead hunger for flesh.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

nodeList.description: Souls deal additional base necrotic damage, but fewer Souls are created with each cast.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Calls forth 2 fewer souls. Deals 30% increased damage.

node.description:
Souls hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health). 

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.

node.description:
Hungering Souls' base damage is increased and converted to fire and its hits ignite instead of possessing. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to necrotic damage.

Souls deal more hit damage.
Souls are larger and deal more hit damage, but Hungering Souls costs more mana.

node.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

nodeList.description: Souls are significantly larger and deal more hit damage, but only one is created with each cast.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Hungering Souls only calls forth one soul, but it is much larger and deals 100% increased damage on hit.

node.description: Souls deal additional base necrotic damage, but fewer Souls are created with each cast.
node.nodeDescription: Calls forth 2 fewer souls. Deals 30% increased damage.

node.loreText: The souls of the dead hunger for flesh.
node.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

nodeList.description: Souls have a chance to grant you mana when they kill an enemy.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Hungering Soul has a 10% chance to return 3 mana when it kills an enemy.

node.description: Souls are significantly larger and deal more hit damage, but only one is created with each cast.

node.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

stats.statName: Chance To Grant Mana On Kill

nodeList.description: Hungering Souls fires additional projectiles, but costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Calls forth [2] additional souls per point. Adds [2] to mana cost per point.

No effect if you have the Isolation node.

node.loreText: The souls of the dead hunger for flesh.
node.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to cast Hungering Souls when hit, but Souls can no longer deal critical strikes.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 5% chance to cast Hungering Souls when hit. Hungering Souls can no longer critically strike.

node.description: Souls deal additional spell necrotic hit damage.
node.nodeDescription: Adds [2] base necrotic damage per point.

node.loreText: The souls of the dead hunger for flesh.
node.nodeDescription:
Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.

Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.

stats.statName: Chance To Cast Hungering Souls When Hit

nodeList.description:
Hungering Souls' base damage is increased and converted to fire and its hits ignite instead of possessing. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to necrotic damage.

Souls deal more hit damage.

node.description: Souls are larger and deal more hit damage, but Hungering Souls costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: [20%] increased size per point. [20%] increased damage on hit per point. Adds [2] to mana cost mana per point.
